content.title: Who am I?
content.description: Curious and driven developer and digital consultant based in Sweden. With a background in sales and marketing, I bring a blend of business insight and technical skills to every project whether it's hands-on coding or supporting organizations in their digital transformation. I thrive in roles where technology and business meet.

content.title: My Journey
content.description: I'm also an enthusiastic adopter of AI tools and technologies, leveraging them to enhance my productivity and deliver high-quality results in less time. Exploring the cutting edge of AI in development is not just about efficiency; it's an exciting journey into how these tools can transform our approach to problem-solving and creative work.

content.title: Technical
content.description: HTML/ CSS/ JavaScript/ TypeScript/ React/ Next.js/ Vue/ Nuxt/ GSAP/ React Native/ Electron/ Node.js/ Express/ SQL/ NoSQL/ Cypress/ DevOps/ CI/CD/ Docker/ UX/UI/ Contentful/ Prismic/ Vercel/ Process & Strategy: Familiar with ITIL framework, Agile methodologies, digital transformation

content.title: Soft values
content.description: Curious^ Creative^ Social^ Analytic^ Proactive^ Self-leadership^ Impactful^ Open-minded^ Time-effective
